Screenshot of a character interaction with the conversation response box highlighted and a callout box. The callout box says "When you select a conversation option, the contact will respond on a new page. For context, your statement is provided firs with the contact's response shown below it. The contact's face is shown alongside their response.

 

Sometimes, a contact may also give you additional documents to review. Those documents will be available in the Review Documents menu. At this point you can choose to continue talking to the contact by selecting the Continue button, or use the menu to do something else, like review a document or talk to a different contact."
